content: Bus garage in Singapore 1°20′19″N 103°56′52″E﻿ / ﻿1.3385°N 103.9478°E﻿ / 1.3385; 103.9478 **Bedok North Bus Depot** is an [SBS Transit](/wiki/SBS_Transit) East District [bus depot](/wiki/Bus_garage) located in [Bedok](/wiki/Bedok), [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). Bedok North Bus Depot started operations in 1982 after the completion of the stretch of road within Bedok North Industrial Park. It replaces the former Changi Bus Depot and Somapah Bus Park which were close to the residential areas and were subject to noise-related complaints. Since 11 December 2011, Service 48 terminates at Bedok North Depot with boarding and alighting done outside at the pair of bus stops. Previously, it terminated at [Upper East Coast Bus Terminal](/wiki/List_of_bus_stations_in_Singapore#Upper_East_Coast_Bus_Terminal). Service 18 also terminates here since 27 November 2022. Previously, it terminating at [Bedok Bus Interchange](/wiki/Bedok_Bus_Interchange). Bedok North Bus Depot will remain operational until the East Coast Bus Depot opens in July 2026, at which point its operations will be restricted to the Bedok Bus Package. - Interchanges and Terminals (SBS Transit) This Singapore bus-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Bedok North Bus Depot
